features: Heavy Duty Broom and Dustpan Set: Broom with dustpan combo set comes with upgraded design, built in comb teeth, 55" long handle tall broom and dustpan set with 5 layers of broom bristles. The spiral joint of a good handle is improved, easy to twist and assemble tightly, say goodbye to loose handles. Floor sweeping is a breeze with this kitchen broom and dustpan set for home!

Extendable Pole Design: The optional extension pole makes the broom length from 39.76 to 51.18 inches, People can choose the appropriate length according to their height. And long handle allow you to Stand upright for comfortable sweeping.NO MORE BENDING!

Self-Cleaning Dustpan Teeth: Built in scraper and comb/Teeth for easy to Clean Broom into Dustpan , Clean Pet Hair and Human Hair with one Pull on the Teeth. The rubber lip of the dust pan is flush with the floor and the teeth clean out the bristles easily.

Saving Space: Standing dustpan lock in open position for easy emptying, can easily dispose of dustpan's contents into the garbage, compact broom dustpan set design lets you hang broom and dustpan together on the wall or put it in the gap of the refrigerator, cabinet, or washing machine. It is very concealed, beautiful and space-saving!

Powerful After-Service: Every customer can enjoy 90 days refund or replacement, No question asked. Please contact us firstly when you have any questions, risk-free guarantee provides a reliable purchasing experience, your satisfaction is our boundless motivation!
body.description: Thick Broom Bristle 5 Rows thick bristles and 12" wide sweeping surface, grabs the dust and debris on floor easily, making indoors and outdoors cleaning more efficient. Bristles size: 12.2(W)*5.2(H) inch Broom handle: 55 inch Flush with the Floor Dustpan The extended rubber dustpan lip is very flat to the floor and leaves no gap, so you can sweep every dust into the dust pan without missing. Dustpan size: 11.8*10.6 inch Dustpan handle: 41.7 inch Durable Stainless Steel Handle Thicker handle for broom and dustpan, super easy to screw together and very sturdy once assembled well. Dustpan Teeth to Clean Broom Built-in dustpan comb for easily removing the dust, dog hair, cat hair and people hair off the broom. Stand up Dustpan with Broom Once kept in LOCKED position, the dust pan will stay upright and doesn't fall over when broom is attached to it. Easy to Store It's easy to keep the broom and dustpan stay together for storage.
